TWITCHCHAT.TwitchChannelHint: The name of the Twitch channel to connect to.
TWITCHCHAT.TwitchUsernameHint: The username of the Twitch account to connect with.
TWITCHCHAT.TwitchOAuthTokenHint: The OAuth token of the Twitch account to connect with.
TWITCHCHAT.FoundryUserHint: The Foundry user to receive/send Twitch messages.
TWITCHCHAT.ShowTwitchEmotesHint: Show Twitch emotes in chat messages.
